price: 43. Reer Thamuudna (calaamaa ku sugan lagu waano qaato), markii lagu yidhi: Raaxeysta in muddo yar ah.
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
